name: Super BMX Fighto Turbo Edition
description:
CONTROLLER REQUIRED

Ride bikes at each other as fast as you can! Crash! Dive into the air and crash! Get flipped turned up side down and crash!

Two vs two game where each teammate takes an analog stick. Spin left stick to pedal faster and use right stick to aim lance. Use the lance to throw yourself into the air. Cool dodge! Death From Above! Probably useless!

No winning or losing, Just wrecking.

Music by Mumblr
